paragraphs.text:
%md

## Identify Key Factors

### Notebook to identify key attributes that have the most influence on a target attribute (high AFFINITY_CARD responders).  We build an Attribute Importance model (minimum desciption length algorithm) using the SH schema data all performed inside the Oracle Autonomous Data Warehouse Cloud (ADWC).

#### By Charlie Berger

paragraphs.title: Build an Attribute Importance Model
Display attributes that most highly influence AFFINITY_CARD high responders
paragraphs.text:
%sql
SELECT attribute_name, explanatory_value, rank
   FROM ai_explain_output
   ORDER BY rank, attribute_name;
